title: Looking to make a friend.
body:
Good day,

My name is CJ and I am 28 years young. I have been playing League of Legends for about 9.5 years and am currently sitting at Plat IV.

All of my real life friends (who played league) have moved onto bigger things in their lives, meanwhile I am sitting here still playing League most afternoons/evenings.

I am putting out the feelers to see if anyone is interested in making a new friend.

PM me in game IGN: CeeeJ
